Tag_Imageneed.description: ''[[The Lost Tales of Greece | Assassin's Creed: Odyssey – The Lost Tales of Greece]]''

MemoryInfobox.description: 'Like Adonis glimpsing his own face on the pool, now Kassandra would come to face with the other "Eagle Bearer (imposter)|Eagle Bearer," hopefully putting this horrible day to an end.'

General_Description: '''There Can Be Only One''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Armed with a viable clue given to her by [[Megakles]], Kassandra set out to find her [[Eagle Bearer (imposter)|impostor]].
Section_Dialogue:
*'''"Eagle Bearer":''' ''The actual [[Eagle]] Bearer. That explains why the invasion failed.''
<tabber>
|-|They didn't stand a chance.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Despite everything you tried to do, [[Alponos]] is safe, and I cleaned up the mess you made.''
|-|Tell me who you really are.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I've been stuck cleaning up your mess since I got here.''
</tabber>

*'''"Eagle Bearer":''' ''What a glorious mess it was. When the [[Piracy|pirates]] paid me to soften the [[Alponos|town']]<nowiki/>s defenses, I didn't think it would be so easy.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''People are dead because of you.''
*'''"Eagle Bearer":''' ''I didn't kill anyone. But you did. We make a great team that way. I steal some tools or blow up an [[Kallipides|old man]]'s [[Blacksmith|forge]]. Send some [[Ajax the Lesser (imposter)|young idiot]] into [[bandit]]-infested mountains. "Lose" a general's [[Horse|steed]]. Then watch you turn it into pure chaos.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The fact that Megakles and the pirates both paid you is just a bonus.''
*'''"Eagle Bearer":''' ''Everyone pays to hear lies they want to believe.''
<tabber>
|-|Fight - You'll die for this.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Time for justice.''
*'''"Eagle Bearer":''' ''May [[Themis|her wrath]] rain down on both of us.''
The mercenaries had an ominous stare down between each other.
*'''"Eagle Bearer":''' ''[[Chikaros]]! Attack!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Chikaros?'' Maláka''.''
A [[chicken]] attacked Kassandra, though she quickly killed it.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm going to feed your corpse to [[Ikaros]], you stupid bird.''
Eventually Kassandra defeated the imposter.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So long, "Eagle Bearer."''
|-|I'm impressed.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm impressed. Even I don't play both sides like that.''
*'''"Eagle Bearer":''' ''I can be even more impressive. You've never thought about it? What it would be like to be with the Eagle Bearer? You're not even a ''little'' curious?''
{{#tag:tabber|
Fight - I'd rather kill you.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Time for justice.''
*'''"Eagle Bearer":''' ''May her wrath rain down on both of us.''
The mercenaries had an ominous stare down between each other.
*'''"Eagle Bearer":''' ''Chikaros! Attack!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Chikaros?'' Maláka''.''
A chicken attacked Kassandra, though she quickly killed it.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm going to feed your corpse to Ikaros, you stupid bird.''
Eventually Kassandra defeated the imposter.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So long, "Eagle Bearer."''
{{!}}-{{!}}
Flirt - I could be tempted.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Now's my chance.''
*'''"Eagle Bearer":''' ''Eagle Bearer, I...''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Shut up.''
They kissed an spent some time togehter.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So, that's what it's like to be with the Eagle Bearer... Turns out I like it.''
*'''"Eagle Bearer":''' ''Me, too.''
{{#tag:tabber|
You still have to die.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That doesn't change anything. You still deserve justice for how many you killed.''
*'''"Eagle Bearer":''' ''You would stain your hands with even more blood?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Gladly.''
The mercenaries had an ominous stare down between each other.
*'''"Eagle Bearer":''' ''Chikaros! Attack!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Chikaros?'' Maláka''.''
A chicken attacked Kassandra, though she quickly killed it.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm going to feed your corpse to Ikaros, you stupid bird.''
Eventually Kassandra defeated the imposter.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So long, "Eagle Bearer."''
{{!}}-{{!}}
Sail with me.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''We clearly get along. Why not join me on my ship?''
*'''"Eagle Bearer":''' ''The'' [[Adrestia]]''? Think of the carnage left in our wake. We would be unstoppable.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm glad we agree.''
{{!}}-{{!}}
See you around.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I needed that after the day I've had.''
*'''"Eagle Bearer":''' ''So, that's it? We part ways, and you let me live?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''For your sake, I'd suggest you don't cross my path again.''
}}
{{!}}-{{!}}
You should join my crew.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''No, but we should join forces. I have a ship.''
*'''"Eagle Bearer":''' ''The'' Adrestia''? Think of the carnage left in our wake. We would be unstoppable.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm glad we agree.''
}}
</tabber>
Section_Outcome: Kassandra faced the Eagle Bearer imposter and Chikaros in battle and defeated them, then looted [[Copycat Sword|the imposter's sword]].
Section_Trivia:
*The name of the memory is a reference to the {{Wiki|Highlander (film)|Highlander}} franchise, where "There can be only one!" is a motto of the {{Wiki|Immortal (Highlander)|Immortals}}.
*Knocking the Eagle Bearer off the cliff allows players to restart his dialog.
*If the Eagle Bearer is not attacked, there is an option to recruit him as a lieutenant for the ''Adrestia''. If this option is chosen, he is the only mercenary that can be recruited for the ''Adrestia'' without having to fight them before hand.
